name: Mr. Buddy
description:
Year 2149. Androids are more and more intelligent and self aware.

Gallan Corporation has become the market leader of robot manufacturing. Their new droid, the Mr. Buddy MB-88, will be release soon .  They hired a new Security Engineer, you, to prevent any inconveniences, industrial espionage or technical problems.

--

"Mr. Buddy" is my first point and click game.

I hope you will enjoy playing it, feel free to leave a comment or report bugs, any advice are welcome.

The game has been done in Adventure Game Studio and the graphics with Aseprite.

Sounds and musics from : https://www.zapsplat.com/
